description: This module aims to guide the students to explore the topics of urban and rural regeneration in Asia. Theories and principles of this area of study are elaborated through examining selected regeneration projects from historical, social, economic and environmental perspectives. This multi-disciplinary module provokes critical thinking of sustainable planning and design in Asia. A field trip is arranged for the students to experience and understand the regeneration practices in the context of Asia.
title: Urban and Rural Regeneration in Asia
